about.title: About
texts: I am a knowledgeable and skilled full-stack web developer with 2.5 years of development experience.

Throughout my career, Typescript has been a language that I have consistently used and deeply immersed myself in. I have experience using Angular to build large-scale ERP systems with a team of over 20 members. I also used it with Pixi.js and Babylon.js to create 2D Canvas and 3D WebGL animations

Even in my spare time, I enjoy using TypeScript with Node.js, React, Express, Vite, etc. to explore cutting-edge web technologies. My personal website was also built with it and using Next.js and Tailwind.

I am motivated and eager to learn new technologies. However, I've realized that self-improvement is crucial, but sharing knowledge with others is equally important. For example, in my past work experience, I have shared new dev-tools, such as Prettier, with my team members to improve code quality and readability. In addition, in my personal Discord group, I often serve as the main speaker, and I've already helped two group members get jobs as front-end developers.

skills.title: Skills
texts: Proficient in using TypeScript with other technologies for development.

For the frontend, use React.js, Next.js, and Angular to build web applications. My preferred CSS framework is Tailwind, but I've also utilized Sass and Styled Components in personal projects for managing styles.

For the backend, I have extensive experience with Node.js and a strong understanding of modularization concepts, such as CommonJS and ESM modules. Depending on requirements, I choose the appropriate tools, such as using Vite to develop SPA. Next.js to provide SEO and pre-rendering to speed up FSP for personal websites. Express.js to build web servers, which can handle I/O-intensive tasks and performance bottlenecks caused by high concurrency.

With containerization technology, I'm always using Linux (Debian) and Docker, deploying my applications to cloud platforms like AWS, Vercel, Deno-Deploy, Heroku and Github. And for development, I love using WSL2 to make sure my projects run seamlessly in production.
For the database system, use Redis for high-performance caching and real-time streaming, as well as PostgreSQL and MongoDB for high-availability data access and retrieval.
